subject: Looking to purchase
description_text:
Hello Sales,

Greetings from TDC USA INC. We are interested in purchasing some items from
your facility. Please advise if you ship to any address?

Kindly reply to this email as soon as possible and also forward your
catalog or current website.

Thanks,
Rosalyn

(563) 794-5429
